arts.sum: Sunderland have set their sights on Orlando Pirates’ Tshegofatso Mabasa, according to Soccer Laduma in South Africa. The striker joined Orlando Pirates in 2019 and was on loan at Sekhukhune United and Moroka Swallows in the past two seasons.
